perturbation.original_text: The term of this Agreement shall be one (1) year unless terminated earlier in accordance with the terms of this Agreement (the "Term").
perturbation.changed_text: The term of this Agreement shall be one (1) year unless terminated earlier in accordance with the terms of this Agreement (the "Term"). However, for projects initiated within the first six months, the Term shall automatically extend until the completion of the said project, regardless of the initial one-year period.
perturbation.explanation: The original text defines the Term as one year. The modified text introduces an exception for projects initiated in the first six months, potentially extending the Term beyond one year, creating a contradiction in the definition of 'Term'. This introduces uncertainty in enforcement since the duration of the agreement now depends on project initiation, a factor not initially considered.

perturbation.original_text: Each of the Parties shall pay their own expenses associated with this Agreement and the transactions contemplated herein.
perturbation.changed_text: Each of the Parties shall pay their own expenses associated with this Agreement and the transactions contemplated herein. However, GINARES shall be reimbursed by HPIL ET for all reasonable travel expenses incurred while visiting HPIL ET's offices for meetings related to this Agreement.
perturbation.explanation: The original text states that each party pays its own expenses. The modified text introduces an exception where HPIL ET reimburses GINARES's travel expenses. This creates a contradiction, as it is now unclear which expenses are to be paid individually and which are reimbursable, leading to potential disputes.

perturbation.original_text:
All notices and other communications required or permitted hereunder shall be in writing and shall be deemed to have been duly given (a) when delivered in person, (b) five (5) business days after being sent by registered or certified mail, return receipt requested, postage prepaid, (c) when dispatched by electronic facsimile transmission (with confirmation of successful transmission), or (d) one (1) business day after having been dispatched by an internationally recognized overnight courier service, in each case to the appropriate Party at the address or facsimile number specified below:

If to HPIL ET:

HPIL ENERGYTECH Inc. Attn.: Louis Bertoli, President and CEO 7075 Gratiot Road, Suite One Saginaw, Michigan 48609 United States of America Facsimile No.: 001(248)750-1016

with a copy (which shall not constitute notice) to the following e-mail addresses: info@hpilenergytech.com

If to the GINARES:

GINARES GROUP AG Attn.: Peter Zu Sayn-Wittgenstein, President and CEO Churerstrasse 47 Pfaeffikon 8808 Switzerland Facsimile No.: +41(55)511-0810

with a copy (which shall not constitute notice) to the following e-mail address:  info@ginares.com

Any Party hereto may change its address or facsimile number for the purposes of this Section 13 by giving notice as provided herein.
perturbation.changed_text:
All notices and other communications required or permitted hereunder shall be in writing and shall be deemed to have been duly given (a) when delivered in person, (b) five (5) business days after being sent by registered or certified mail, return receipt requested, postage prepaid, (c) when dispatched by electronic facsimile transmission (with confirmation of successful transmission), or (d) one (1) business day after having been dispatched by an internationally recognized overnight courier service, in each case to the appropriate Party at the address or facsimile number specified below:

If to HPIL ET:

HPIL ENERGYTECH Inc. Attn.: Louis Bertoli, President and CEO 7075 Gratiot Road, Suite One Saginaw, Michigan 48609 United States of America Facsimile No.: 001(248)750-1016

with a copy (which shall not constitute notice) to the following e-mail addresses: info@hpilenergytech.com

If to the GINARES:

GINARES GROUP AG Attn.: Peter Zu Sayn-Wittgenstein, President and CEO Churerstrasse 47 Pfaeffikon 8808 Switzerland Facsimile No.: +41(55)511-0810

with a copy (which shall not constitute notice) to the following e-mail address:  info@ginares.com
Notwithstanding the above, for urgent operational matters, email communication to the respective 'info' email addresses shall be deemed sufficient notice.
perturbation.explanation: The original text stipulates specific methods for delivering official notices. The modification introduces a contradictory provision stating that email to the 'info' addresses is sufficient for urgent matters. This creates ambiguity about when and how official notices are to be delivered, potentially leading to disputes over the validity of delivered communications.
